New Records: Tanzim Sakib took 3 wickets, a career-best performance in T20I
Close to 25,000 fans attended the match in New York
Key Match Events: Tanzim Sakib's impressive spell of bowling led to key South African wickets
Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller's 79-run partnership was a turning point
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa won the toss and chose to bat
Bangladesh had strong crowd support in New York
Post-Match Reflections: Tanzim Sakib expressed appreciation for the crowd's support
The match went into extra overs before the result was decided
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a significant event for Bangladesh in New York
The crowd size was the second-largest at the venue after the India vs Pakistan match
